A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A franchise that has lost its soul: sacrificing action for characterization\, special effects for dramatization\, and convenience for cleverness.  People trashed George Lucas unfairly; Lucas at least had originality in his trilogies and the characters had story archs (the originals being based on mythology and the prequels having political messages). What is the point of the new Star Wars movies? Thus far\, to be formulaic conveyor belt films to make more money. It's no longer Star Wars; Disney should have listened to George Lucas or at least had him involved with their projects.
